documents.document: @Matt_n_th_Hat @ArriaCross Ace... *_* One of the most awesome characters ever!!! Just take my beri already
@RemyFool I'm sure I'll like anything you write. Hope you're enjoying/enjoyed your lunch!
@Aezreal Nothing wrong with that. This is a tweet of your own too
@RemyFool Awe thanks Remy. It's going well. c: Looking forward to your upcoming post lol~
@RemyFool ;__; At least you have the night? and spending time with fam is great. Positive reframing haha. It's something I learned in psych
@Aezreal The 1 hr wait was in the morning. It took like 2 hours longer to get home because the driver drove very slow. Understandable tho...
@Aezreal Yeah I was in a very bad mood on Friday because I had to wait for an hour in the cold for the bus. I got home at 9 PM too :/
@RemyFool I hope you get everything (or mostly everything) you want to get done, done today :)
@Aezreal Photo of my neighbourhood for you lol. It is pretty c: https://t.co/5D8mXnaKiv
@PalpableEmoji @justone_tae Oh, I got it. If you've watched One Piece, you'll be like Brook! LOL
@Aezreal The city is doing that but it's definitely a lot of work for sure... So much area to take care of x.x
@PalpableEmoji @justone_tae ...well that puts things into perspective. Hmmmm um... @______@
@Aezreal Yes, I was wearing boots and snow still got in them LOL. It can get worse. There's been so many traffic accidents :(
The 15 or so cm of snow makes me want to stay at home FOREVER... or until winter is over. Hibernation has never been so tempting haha
@Aezreal Haha yeah it's because I kept referring my friends by the first letter of their name, so A, C, etc.
@Aezreal Yay, you got it. LOOL someone commented on my blog before and called it my alphabet crew. So I just went with it!
@Matt_n_th_Hat Well, technically you didn't get it right the first try LOL... High five, I guess?
@Matt_n_th_Hat Yup. This was taken a year ago but yeah same friends, same face lol
@Matt_n_th_Hat Um... can you be a little more specific?
Alphabet Crew (my best friends I always eat food with). Can you tell which one is me? I won't get mad if you get it… https://t.co/dszumXgfx9
@Matt_n_th_Hat @sindyblue10 :/ That's too bad...
@Matt_n_th_Hat @sindyblue10 Matt, have you tried the green tea ones, at least?
@sindyblue10 @Matt_n_th_Hat Okay, I'll try it if you say so. Problem is that I've never seen them in stores before. Hmm hopefully!
@sindyblue10 @Matt_n_th_Hat They have those!? Whoaaaa idk if I would want to try one though... Matcha kit kat is my fav <3
@sindyblue10 Tbh I had to Google what it meant. >< Then I thought, wow I'm a girl but did not get it. Was thinking along the lines of CO2!
@sindyblue10 Lol I just noticed the diamond beside your name. I don't think it's general knowledge...
@aine751 Oh I thought you were a girl lol. It's okay, either is fine! ^^
@Matt_n_th_Hat No need to say sorry. I blame the snow for causing traffic accidents. Maybe it's better that it doesn't snow in your area...
@Matt_n_th_Hat Thx. My dinner plans got cancelled and I was really looking forward to it. Sighh
@Matt_n_th_Hat mhm. Sorry, I'm just in a rly bad mood because of the sucky morning and lack of sleep from studying for the exam. Thanks Matt
@animated06 Aw, sorry to hear about your friend... *Hugs* As for myself - I'm feeling a lot better now, thanks to everyone! Thank you :D
@Matt_n_th_Hat That's comforting to hear. Mhmm, yes
@RemyFool Thanks Remy! ^^ I do feel relieved for sure.
@Aezreal Yes, I think so too. Thank you :)
@Matt_n_th_Hat I think the worst part was going through it alone. Maybe because I never talked about it. Haha
@Matt_n_th_Hat Thanks, it is something that happened a while ago. I've healed, but I guess it's something I will always remember.
@RemyFool Thank you. I've never talked about this at all before. I just didn't blog much that time. I'm glad I finally said something.
@PalpableEmoji Thank you. I don't think about it everyday but I was reading my msgs w/ him from 2014 and I guess se… https://t.co/QkkbmhEw1b
@aine751 It's been a while, but I do think about it time to time. It's something that never really goes away. Thanks c:
I'm glad I'm learning about suicide in school. One of the reasons why I want to be a counsellor. I miss my friend....
@Chiharumon Oh wow, I agree. So useful!
@jemp00t YAY you're going to do great! 😍😍 Good luck girl!
@Chiharumon Awweh, thanks so much 💖
(Might delete later) I got cute hair ties in the mail yesterday and I love them~ https://t.co/sEvd1CRC5m
@aine751 Yeah I think having feelings with someone you've never met in person is ok. It's understandable. Wishing you the best
@RemyFool Idk about diet bc that's not my area of knowledge, but sleep more. That would help get those serotonin levels up
@RemyFool HOPE YOU GET YOUR MOTIVATION BACK
@aine751 It can be genuine. Their personality, I guess.... unless you know how they look and like that too. Hopefully you can meet them IRL?
@RemyFool Ya, but I'm used to it. When I worked as a tutor, I got home at 10:30 PM two days a wk and ate late. Then studied after that lol
@RemyFool Yeah it is. Sry for the late reply, I was at the Lab and still at the Uni. No dinner yet and I'll get home at 11 T.T
@RemyFool That looks good. Did you make it yourself? Lol at the salt and pepper
@ArriaCross *HUGS* It's such an unfortunate event but we are all very glad that you're okay. YOI is there to help! Hope you feel better <3
@Matt_n_th_Hat Haha yeah, and also it mentioned how the Internet and games provide opportunities to interact with others. That is true.
Psyc textbook talked about how alter-egos /avatar PFP on the Internet help people get closer to their ideal selves. Interesting...
@Matt_n_th_Hat Hahaha, I did enjoy the moments they shared, from the tennis match to being handcuffed together
@RemyFool YAY. Tell me your thoughts about it later!
@RemyFool The main guy reminds me of Arata from ReLIFE. I feel that I've learned a lot from it. REMY, WATCH IT when you have time c:
@RemyFool Yay! Do you know the game? I've watched the movie for it more than once, and I almost never re-watch stuff
@RemyFool It changes every week, but right now, I really like tracks from the Catherine OST. Lamb Game Between ♂ and ♀ is one of them
@RemyFool It is really nice. I don't think I've heard of music similar to this before. I like it
@RemyFool Nice. What are your favourite songs?
@beatrice_delrow >_< Thanks Beatrice~
@beatrice_delrow Thanks sweetie! It's a wig btw hahaha
@aine751 @Aezreal Don't feel pressured though! It's okay being sad sometimes. Do things at your own pace, whatever makes you comfortable.
@aine751 @Aezreal It's true. (Know this since I'm Psychology major uni student) Sera, I do hope that you feel better soon
@emvee_ Oh no... Thanks for the info and I will! You too!
@emvee_ Awweh :( Which one is it? Hope you feel better soon
@Matt_n_th_Hat Oh, I'm surprised you haven't yet. DO IT NOW LOL. Just kidding. Honestly, it's a must watch kind of show.
@Matt_n_th_Hat Thanks for the info. I'm just so excited to see Lelouch once again. I got a pin of him custom made and wear on my backpack
Losing my mind over Code Geass Season 3. Lelouch is returning to us. All hail Lelouch!
@miss_waves_ But if I did, I wouldn't have talked to some of you guys... >_<
*Asks friend if he has Twitter* Him: what happened to social media hibernating *Remembers I said I would go into hibernation* OTL
@PalpableEmoji Hahaha. Well, muffins are important too! :')
@Matt_n_th_Hat Thank you. I'm glad that I have my Twitter friends! You know what, it's kind of dumb. There are so many amazing ppl out there
@Matt_n_th_Hat I guess I'm just confused. Oh well it's a year already
@RemyFool I think it's a little different from what you think. I can PM you about it after class maybe lol
I wish I could just read the mind of one person and know what he's thinking. So much miscommunication. I don't even know what happened.
@Chiharumon Oh nice! Can't wait to see it. I'm just having lunch at school now. Class is going to start soon
@Chiharumon How's it going? Hope you're having a good day~
@Matt_n_th_Hat Lol, I was thinking of Mikami as I wrote this.
@Matt_n_th_Hat Hm, why don't we change the topic? It's night right now, right? You should sleep soon haha!
@Matt_n_th_Hat Still not necessarily a bad thing. :)
@Matt_n_th_Hat Yes, but I say it in person. Not as much online!
@Matt_n_th_Hat It's not a bad habit. I apologize a lot too. Yeah, it's a way to make friends, I agree.
@Matt_n_th_Hat Ahaha no need to keep on apologizing! It's really okay! Yeah, it is a great thing for sure that anime reaches out to all
@Matt_n_th_Hat No worries! I wasn't trying to call you out. I know that you're not that kind of person. DW
@Matt_n_th_Hat Hmm why must there be proof? The wording is a little... awkward. It sounds as if it's surprising that pretty women like anime
@PalpableEmoji Yeah :/ If they do scale it, it will be 88% which is a good score, but sad to know that my actual score was a lot higher
@PalpableEmoji It's literally so sad. Last term, my final grade got scaled down 7%. I almost cried LOL. Thanks!! ^^
68/70 on my first exam this term. 97.14% ehehe. The Uni will scale my mark down though because it's "too high." T.T
@artistbybeauty Another well deserved award. Congrats girl <3
A friend gave me a good pen randomly as a gift. It's so useful! #thankful
@Matt_n_th_Hat He will be the king of the pirates and find One Piece!
@Matt_n_th_Hat I'm so proud of him! *_* He is 100% real in my heart. I like the other characters too. They're all great choices!
https://t.co/Tjn1uIoozO Luffy is officially an ambassador for the 2020 Olympics! *_*

I wrote too much for my assignment again LOL. Time to delete, delete, delete.
